2.0.name: wordpress/pictips
2.0.description:
Ever wanted to make your content more visual? With PicTips, you can! Hovering over an item with a PicTip enabled will display your chosen image.

PicTips features the following:

  • Displays images as tooltip bubbles
  • Automatically resizes and positions bubbles as required
  • Customise look and feel of bubbles for your site
  • Graceful fall back for non-compatible browsers

Please raise any support queries on the support forum.

Want more styles for PicTips? Try downloading an Add-On Style Pack
